title: Workflow Orchestration Tool Input Schema
description: Schema for defining available tools input for workflow orchestration

available_tools.description: List of available tools that can be used in the workflow

description.description: Detailed description of what the tool does

resource.description: Amazon Resource Name for the tool resource

parameters.description: List of parameters accepted by the tool

return.description: Information about the return value of the tool

type.description: Data type of the parameter (e.g., string, number, boolean, object, array)

description.description: Description of the parameter and its purpose

required.description: Whether the parameter is required or optional

default_value.description: Default value for the parameter if not provided

constraints.description: Optional constraints on the parameter values

type.description: Data type of the return value (e.g., string, number, boolean, object, array)

description.description: Description of the return value and its purpose

schema.description: Optional JSON schema defining the structure of complex return types
